name: Crime Mystery In Mansion
description:
Crime Case in Mansion Mystery Get the best hidden object game
Crime case game is hidden crime case in different crime city With 125 Level.crime case is a puzzle solving game and challenging game.in mystery hidden object game find clue and get evidence to catch criminal.Crime case investigation of the real criminal.are you ready to solve your first murder cases?

There are so many different stories and reasons of the crime. Can you find all the Hidden Objects? Be the most anxious detective in crime unit & solve the unsolvable murder case. Mystery Crime Case in Mansion - Hidden Object is a puzzle game where the player has to find evidence then guess and find who is a criminal. You are the adventurous detective of 125 case and you have to find the serial killer.

list of features:
- find the evidence from all hidden objects and guess the criminal
- 125 level of hidden object puzzles
- examine clues and analyses samples to look for evidence
- solve hidden crimes
